n trying to crawl an FTP site using Heritrix 3. I have read through the doc=

However I get a "unknown=
 #001" in the log and nothing gets crawled. 



On going through the crawle=
r-beans.cxml, I found there are "FetchDNS" and "FetchHTTP" modules but none=
 for FTP.

 appreciated.



Thanks

Sriram.

      <p>Hello,<br>

and entered the seed as <a rel=3D"nofollow" target=3D"_blank" href=3D"ftp:/=
/ftphostname.org">ftp://ftphostname.org</a><br>
<br>
However I get a "unkno=
wn #001" in the log and nothing gets crawled. <br>
<br>
On going through th=
e crawler-beans.cxml, I found there are "FetchDNS" and "FetchHTTP" modules =
but none for FTP. <br>
<br>
Is that required for fetching FTP sites.<br>
<b=
r>
Any help would be appreciated.<br>
<br>
Thanks<br>
Sriram.<br>
